response.overview: A kinky, oversexed Stepmom (Bianca Beauchamp) can’t keep her hands off her Stepson (Nate Rose). Sitting on the toilet, Bianca masturbates for Nate and gives him a juicy blowjob. She’s every Stepson’s fantasy. Never satisfied, Bianca seduces Nate’s best friend (Santi Boom). Nate comes home early, catches them red-handed and decides to join the fun for an amazing threesome. An incredibly horny Bianca won’t be satisfied until she persuades her Stepson, his girlfriend and his best friend to have a raunchy foursome suck and fuck fest.
response.title: My Stepmom Is a Slut 2
